name: Leather Jackets-Leather Fashion Jackets
description: Glance Leather Industries is a leading Manufacturer in high quality Leather Clothing. Leather jackets have made up a vital part of every man or women wardrobe for hundreds of years; Our Leather Jackets are practical, long lasting. A truly Fashion leather jacket will have you feeling like the top of luxury - you will feel the elegance and the power of wearing a custom made designer leather jacket from the top of your head to the tip of your toes. No matter what the reason, our leather jacket is a great addition to your closet. Glance is all about style and class.
